Constructor Detail

SimpleMapReduce

public SimpleMapReduce(java.util.Properties properties)
Construct with an ngrams directory with its 'n' for exploding out

Properties:

  • verbose -- (optional, default=true) whether to be verbose while working
  • inDataDir -- (required) path to mapper output root directory (i.e. .../LDC2006T13.mapped.0)
  • mapOutDir -- (required) path to root directory for map output
  • reduceOutDir -- (required) path to root directory for reduce output
  • maxMapPairs -- (required) maximum number of entries for collecting map terms
  • maxReducePairs -- (required) maximum number of entries to write before rolling reduce output files
  • skipMapper -- (optional, default=false) true to skip running the mapper
  • skipReducer -- (optional, default=false) true to skip running the reducer

getMaxPairs

protected int getMaxPairs(java.lang.Integer chainNum)
Description copied from class: CombinedMapReduce
Get the maximum number of pairs to write to a file during the 'chainNum' phase.

Intended for extenders to override. Default is 10,000,000.

Where chainNum is

  • null or 0 for map phase
  • N > 0 for Nth reduce phase

Overrides:
getMaxPairs in class CombinedMapReduce<K extends java.lang.Comparable<K>,V,A,R>

preMapHook

protected boolean preMapHook()
Description copied from class: CombinedMapReduce
Hook executed prior to running the mapper.

Intended for extenders to override. Default is true.

Overrides:
preMapHook in class CombinedMapReduce<K extends java.lang.Comparable<K>,V,A,R>
Returns:
true to run the mapper; false to skip running the mapper.

preReduceHook

protected boolean preReduceHook()
Description copied from class: CombinedMapReduce
Hook executed prior to running the reducer.

Intended for extenders to override. Default is true.

Overrides:
preReduceHook in class CombinedMapReduce<K extends java.lang.Comparable<K>,V,A,R>
Returns:
true to run the reducer; false to skip running the reducer.
